channel.title: World of Warcaft on Cyb10101
channel.description: Recent content in World of Warcaft on Cyb10101

item.title: Open the binary chest in Torghast
item.description: In the game World of Warcraft there is a binary chest in the dungeon Torghast. To open the chest, you have to go through all possible combinations and one combination opens the box. The 0 for lever is down and the 1 for lever is up. 0000000100100011 0100010101100111 1000100110101011 1100110111101111 Too difficult to remember? It is easier with this memory aid: 1, Again more precisely: 1, 1,
